text:
I am hoping we can find time soon for a long walk or even better, the Dolar Shop or a window seat at Flo.
Be well, Christine
Message 769 of 4024
Why couldn’t you have been kind enough to put a bullet in my head... making me watch all my hopes and dreams die before my eyes, slowly,
painfully, is the most heartbreaking thing possible. God  I wish you had just found a way to kill me...
